infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Parking Remind needs access to your camera to take pictures of parking signs, which are used to determine parking restrictions and set reminders accordingly.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Parking Remind needs access to your calendar to create reminders for when you need to move your car, ensuring you avoid parking tickets.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Parking Remind requires access to your location to save the location of your parked car, making it easier to find your car and to set accurate reminders.

plugins.calendarPermission: Parking Remind needs access to your calendar to create reminders for when you need to move your car, ensuring you avoid parking tickets.

plugins.cameraPermission: Parking Remind needs access to your camera to take pictures of parking signs, which are used to determine parking restrictions and set reminders accordingly.

plugins.cameraPermissionText: Parking Remind needs access to your camera to take pictures of parking signs, which are used to determine parking restrictions and set reminders accordingly.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Parking Remind requires access to your location to save the location of your parked car, making it easier to find your car and to set accurate reminders.
